article.name: What is Mackerel's IP address and port number?
article.title: What is Mackerel's IP address and port number?
article.body:
mackerel.io / api.mackerelio.com / kcps-mackerel.io are all hosted from the range below. In the event of a change, an announcement will be made in advance.

  • IP address ranges
    • 13.113.31.156/32
    • 54.92.89.142/32
    • 52.196.35.56/32
    • 52.69.239.167/32
    • 52.198.226.45/32
    • 52.198.218.152/32
    • 13.113.245.173/32
    • 52.199.207.168/32
    • 52.193.231.228/32
  • Please allow all IP addresses.
  • The port number is 443.
  • mackerel-agent also makes requests with the above-mentioned IP address and port number.
  • It is also possible to obtain it in JSON format. For more information, please see the following page.
    • IP address ranges
  • When installing the agent, you must also grant permission for communication with the repository.
    • The repository is hosted on Amazon S3. For the IP address range used by Amazon S3, refer to the AWS IP address ranges.

Related Information

See the following page for source IP addresses for Mackerel notifications and external monitoring requests.

  • What is the source IP address for Webhook and other servicesâ€™ alert notifications from Mackerel?

Records

  • Amended on Aug 7, 2017
